definitions.definition: Not personal ; not representing a person ; not having personality.

examples: She sounded impersonal as she gave her report of the Nazi death camps.

definitions.definition: Not having a subject, or having a third person pronoun without an antecedent.
examples: The verb “rain” is impersonal in sentences like “It’s raining.”
labels: of a verb or other word
definitions.label_groups: grammar , of a verb or other word

main_definition: Not personal ; not representing a person ; not having personality.
secondary_definitions: ( grammar , of a verb or other word ) Not having a subject, or having a third person pronoun without an antecedent.
